channel.title: K-Pop on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in K-Pop on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Academy Museum and CJ ENM Partner Up for Korean Content-Themed Event Ahead of KCON
item.description: The event, titled “K-Culture Night at Academy Museum with KCON,” will celebrated the K-pop-focused festival’s 13th anniversary with idols, actors and more.

item.title: Academy Museum and CJ ENM Partner Up for Korean Content-Themed Event Ahead of KCON

item.title: Blackpink Returns to L.A. to Remind Us All Why They’re the Biggest Girl Group in the World
item.description: The four-member supergroup brought their Deadline world tour to L.A.’s SoFi Stadium with two sold-out shows over the weekend, with the tour serving as a reunion of sorts after successful solo endeavor

item.title: Blackpink Teams Up with Fanatics and Complex for L.A. Pop-Up
item.description: Blackpink also launched a pop-up at the Hollywood Palladium, where fans can grab exclusive merch.

item.title: ATEEZ Partners Up With Amazon Music for In Your Fantasy Tour Merchandise
item.description: The eight-piece K-pop sensation kicked off the North American leg of their world tour in Atlanta Thursday night.
